nodes.text: Boldheart was a Corona-class frigate of the New Republic Defense Fleet.

While on patrol during Admiral Daala's campaign in 11 ABY, Boldheart came across the Teljkon Vagabond—the New Republic's first encounter with the vessel. When Boldheart attempted to halt the vessel with a shot across its bow, the Vagabond disabled the frigate's engines with a single shot and fled into hyperspace. The holos from this encounter provided New Republic Intelligence with its first images of the Vagabond.
